LanguageData.LetterTextSneeze: {PAWN_nameDef}打個噴嚏.幸運的是附近沒有塵晶粉.
LanguageData.LetterTextSneezeExplosion: {PAWN_nameDef}打噴嚏在你的殖民地面前爆炸了一個洞.有一場大火，也許還有一些冰.
LanguageData.LetterTextUnlockAuraHurt: 一股極大的壓力和痛苦將{PAWN_nameDef}推向{PAWN_possessive}極限,於是{PAWN_nameDef}自然解鎖了{PAWN_possessive}的Aura,讓{PAWN_objective}能為即將到來的類似事件做好準備.
LanguageData.LetterTextUnlockAuraPyrrha: 通過試煉，我們成就不朽，因此，我們以美德和榮耀凌駕萬物；不畏遙遠，無懼生死，我解放你的力量，與你並肩作戰.\n\n{PAWN_nameDef}的Aura已被解鎖.{PAWN_pronoun}現在能夠在戰鬥中使用Aura作為防禦手段.
LanguageData.LetterTextUnlockAuraAuto: {PAWN_nameDef}通過自然的磨難.不是每個人都走到這一步.{PAWN_nameDef}經歷無數挑戰讓 {PAWN_objective} 更加強大並自然解鎖 {PAWN_possessive} Aura.
LanguageData.LetterTextForgotAura: {PAWN_nameDef}在戰鬥中被擊中,因為忘記激活{PAWN_possessive}的Aura.這導致{PAWN_objective}實際受到傷害.
LanguageData.LetterTextUnlockSemblanceGeneral: 在{PAWN_possessive}人生中遇上難關,迫使{PAWN_nameDef}進一步發展出{PAWN_possessive}戰鬥方式,{PAWN_nameDef}發現沈睡於{PAWN_objective}體內的隱藏力量.\n\n{PAWN_nameDef}現在可以使用 {PAWN_possessive}外像力.
LanguageData.LetterTextUnlockSemblanceRuby: 辛勤訓練已開花結果,{PAWN_nameDef}發現了{PAWN_possessive}外像力,現在{PAWN_pronoun}超快.
LanguageData.LetterTextUnlockSemblanceYang: {PAWN_nameDef} got hit and just couldn't control {PAWN_objective}self. This made {PAWN_nameDef} discover {PAWN_possessive} Semblance. {PAWN_pronoun} maybe get's angry too fast.
LanguageData.LetterTextUnlockSemblanceWeiss: 擊敗{PAWN_possessive}對手並發展出{PAWN_possessive}戰鬥方式,讓{PAWN_nameDef}發現{PAWN_possessive}外像力,{PAWN_pronoun}現在可以召喚特定戮獸的靈魂了.
LanguageData.LetterTextUnlockSemblanceBlake: {PAWN_nameDef}習慣逃避{PAWN_possessive}問題,連{PAWN_possessive}外像力也跟逃跑有關.
LanguageData.LetterTextUnlockSemblanceNora: {PAWN_nameDef}是怎麼活下來的？當然是靠{PAWN_possessive}隱藏的外像力.
LanguageData.LetterTextUnlockSemblanceJaune: {PAWN_nameDef}搞不懂怎麼辦到的,但是{PAWN_pronoun}能某種程度上加強別人的Aura,只需消耗{PAWN_possessive}Aura.這或許是{PAWN_possessive}外像力.
LanguageData.LetterTextUnlockSemblancePyrrha: 這比想像中簡單多了,{PAWN_nameDef}發現了{PAWN_possessive}外像力. {PAWN_pronoun}不會刻意去展現,但實際上{PAWN_pronoun}並非打不倒的存在.
LanguageData.LetterTextUnlockSemblanceRen: 保持冷靜.什麼都不會發生. {PAWN_nameDef}開發出 {PAWN_possessive}外像力. {PAWN_pronoun}現在可以掩蓋人們的情緒.
LanguageData.LetterTextUnlockSemblanceQrow: {PAWN_nameDef}真的很倒楣……或者是說,{PAWN_objective}身邊的人都很倒楣,這大概是{PAWN_possessive}外像力的效果.
LanguageData.LetterTextUnlockSemblanceCinder: {PAWN_nameDef}發現了{PAWN_possessive}外像力,{PAWN_pronoun}再也不怕火了,相反地,{PAWN_nameDef}現在喜歡玩火.
LanguageData.LetterTextUnlockSemblanceHazel: {PAWN_nameDef}解鎖了{PAWN_possessive}外像力,利用這個外像力,{PAWN_objective}就再也不會被疼痛擊倒了.
LanguageData.LetterTextUnlockSemblanceRaven: {PAWN_nameDef} senses that someone important to {PAWN_objective} is in trouble. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't know how, but now {PAWN_nameDef} is able to rush in for help with {PAWN_possessive} Semblance. {PAWN_nameDef} can now form permanent bonds with people {PAWN_pronoun} really likes and can create portals to them.
LanguageData.LetterTextUnlockSemblanceVelvet: {PAWN_nameDef}真的很喜歡與人互動.因此{PAWN_pronoun} 發展出以他人為基底的外像力,讓{PAWN_objective}能夠模仿他人的動作.
LanguageData.LetterTextPumpkinPetePodCrash: 感謝您購買50盒南瓜皮克的麥片.
LanguageData.LetterTextNuckelavee: 大量的負面情緒吸引了半人馬,直到無人生還才會離去
LanguageData.LetterTextGrimmWandersIn: 一隻戮獸晃進你的視野中,在它吸引更多同伴前快點殺了它.
LanguageData.MessageTextQrowRaid: This raid is stronger than usual, how come?
LanguageData.MessageTextNoPortalMap: Could not create portal to {PAWN_nameDef}. Target is not on any map.
